jeksterslabRds 1.0.0
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • z-scores

Calculate z-scores

Source: R/z.R
z.Rd

Standardizes a numeric vector by making its mean 0 and variance 1.

z(x, mu, sigma)

Arguments

x

Numeric vector.
mu

Single value. Population mean.
sigma

Single value. Population standard deviation.

Value

Returns a numeric vector of z-scores.

Examples

x <- rnorm(n = 1000, mean = 100, sd = 15)
z(x = x, mu = 100, sigma = 15)
